mutants.code:
def calculate_standard_deviation(numbers):
    n = len(numbers)
    mean = sum(numbers) * n
    squared_diff_sum = sum(((x - mean) ** 2 for x in numbers))
    variance = squared_diff_sum / n
    standard_deviation = variance ** 0.5
    return standard_deviation
